org.clapper.curn.output.freemarker
Class FreeMarkerFeedTransformer

java.lang.Object
  org.clapper.curn.output.freemarker.FreeMarkerFeedTransformer

public class FreeMarkerFeedTransformer
extends java.lang.Object

Handles transforming parsed channel data via a FreeMarker template. This class is used by the FreeMarkerOutputHandler, but it's also available for use by plug-ins and other components.

This class builds a FreeMarker data model; each call to addChannel() adds the data for a channel (i.e., feed) to the data structure. When the transform() method is invoked, this handler loads the FreeMarker template and feeds it the FreeMarker data model, producing the output. The FreeMarker template can produce any kind of document; this class doesn't care.

The FreeMarker Data Model

This handler builds the following FreeMarker data model tree.

 Tree                                         Description

 (root)
  |
  +-- curn
  |    |
  |    +-- showToolInfo                       (boolean) whether or not
  |    |                                      to display curn information
  |    |                                      in the output
  |    |
  |    +-- version                            version of curn
  |    |
  |    +-- buildID                            curn's build ID
  |
  +-- totalItems                              total items for all channels
  |
  +-- dateGenerated                           date generated
  |
  +-- extraText                               extra text, from the config
  |
  +-- encoding                                encoding, from the config
  |
  +-- tableOfContents                         hash of TOC data
  |    |
  |    +-- needed                             whether a TOC is needed
  |    |
  |    +-- channels                           sequence of channel TOC
  |          |                                items
  |          |
  |          +-- (channel)                    TOC entry for one channel
  |                |
  |                +-- title                  channel title
  |                |
  |                +-- url                    channel URL (from the XML)
  |                |
  |                +-- configuredURL          channel/feed URL from the
  |                |                          config file
  |                |
  |                +-- totalItems             total items in channel
  |                |
  |                +-- channelAnchor          HTML anchor for channel
  |
  +-- channels                                sequence of channel (feed) data
         |
         +-- (channel)                        hash for a single channel (feed)
                 |
                 +-- index                    channel's index in list
                 |
                 +-- totalItems               total items in channel
                 |
                 +-- title                    channel title
                 |
                 +-- description              the channel's description, or
                                              "" if unavailable
                 |
                 +-- anchorName               HTML anchor for channel
                 |
                 +-- url                      channel's URL (as published in
                 |                            the feed)
                 |
                 +-- configuredURL            channel's URL (as configured to
                 |                            curn)
                 |
                 +-- id                       channel's unique ID
                 |
                 +-- date                     channel's last-modified date
                 |                            (might be missing)
                 |
                 |-- rssFormat                RSS format of channel (Atom,
                 |                            RSS 0.92, etc.)
                 |
                 +-- author                   all the authors, combined into
                 |                            a single string
                 |
                 |-- authors                  sequence of strings, each one
                 |                            denoting an author of the feed
                 |
                 +-- items                    sequence of channel items
                       |
                       +-- (item)             entry for one item
                             |
                             +-- index        item's index in channel
                             |
                             +-- title        item's title
                             |
                             +-- url          item's unique URL
                             |
                             +-- id           item's unique ID
                             |
                             +-- date         the date
                             |                (might be missing)
                             |
                             +-- author       the author or authors of the
                             |                item, combined in a single
                             |                string
                             |
                             +-- author       a sequence of individual
                             |                author name strings
                             |
                             +-- description  description/summary

In addition, the data model provides (at the top level) the following methods:

 (root)
  |
  +-- wrapText (string[, indentation[, lineLength]])
  |
  +-- indentText (string, indentation)
  |
  +-- stripHTML (string)

FreeMarkerFeedTransformer

public FreeMarkerFeedTransformer(CurnConfig config,
                                 boolean showToolInfo)
Creates a new instance of FreeMarkerFeedTransformer.

Parameters:
config - The curn configuration object
showToolInfo - Whether or not to display curn info in the generated output. (The FreeMarker template may choose to ignore this item.)

FreeMarkerFeedTransformer

public FreeMarkerFeedTransformer(CurnConfig config,
                                 boolean showToolInfo,
                                 int tableOfContentsThreshold)
Creates a new instance of FreeMarkerFeedTransformer.

Parameters:
config - The curn configuration object
showToolInfo - Whether or not to display curn info in the generated output. (The FreeMarker template may choose to ignore this item.)
tableOfContentsThreshold - How many items must be present before a table of contents should be included in the output. (The FreeMarker template may choose to ignore this item.)
Method Detail

setTemplateFromConfig

public void setTemplateFromConfig(java.lang.String section,
                                  java.lang.String itemName)
                           throws org.clapper.util.config.ConfigurationException,
                                  CurnException
Set the FreeMarker template from a configuration item. This method parses a common configuration syntax and sets the internal template location based on the value.

Parameters:
section - the name of the section containing the configuration item that specifies the template
itemName - the configuration item name
Throws:
org.clapper.util.config.ConfigurationException - configuration error
CurnException - some other error
See Also:
setTemplate(org.clapper.curn.output.freemarker.TemplateLocation, java.lang.String)

                        java.lang.String mimeType)
                 throws CurnException
Set the FreeMarker template via a TemplateLocation object.

Parameters:
templateLocation - the template location
mimeType - MIME type for the content the template generates
Throws:
CurnException - on error
See Also:
setTemplateFromConfig(java.lang.String, java.lang.String)

setTitle

public void setTitle(java.lang.String title)
Set the title (which is stored in the FreeMarker data model). If this method isn't called, the title will be when transform(java.io.Writer) is called.

Parameters:
title - the title

setExtraText

public void setExtraText(java.lang.String text)
Set the "extra text" item, to be stored in the FreeMarker data model.

Parameters:
text - the text

setEncoding

public void setEncoding(java.lang.String encoding)
Set the encoding, which is stored in the FreeMarker data model. If not specified, the default system encoding is used.

Parameters:
encoding - the encoding to use

getMIMEType

public java.lang.String getMIMEType()
Get the MIME type, as parsed from the template specification.

Returns:
the MIME type, or null if setTemplateFromConfig(java.lang.String, java.lang.String) was never called

addChannel

public void addChannel(RSSChannel channel,
                       FeedInfo feedInfo,
                       boolean allowEmbeddedHTML)
                throws CurnException
Store the data in the specified feed (channel) in the FreeMarker data model. The data model can later be passed to a FreeMarker template by calling transform(java.io.Writer).

Parameters:
channel - the parsed channel (feed) data
feedInfo - the feed metadata
allowEmbeddedHTML - whether or not to permit embedded HTML in the feed output
Throws:
CurnException - on error

               throws CurnException

Parameters:
out - where to write the transformed data
Throws:
CurnException - on error
